trans-unit.source: (I use the mingw gcc compiler here to build the extension)
trans-unit.target: （我在这里使用mingw gcc编译器来构建扩展名）

trans-unit.source: .fd File Parser amitools.fd
vamosV)irtual AM)iga OS
cython: (version >= 0.25) required to rebuild the native module
lhafile - FS Edition: required to use .lha file scanner
trans-unit.target: lhafile-FS Edition：必须使用 .lha 文件扫描程序

trans-unit.source: amitools is a collection of Python 3 tools that I've written to work with Amiga OS binaries and files on Mac OS X and all other *nix-like platforms supporting Python. Windows might work as well, but is heavily untested. However, patches are welcome.
trans-unit.target: amitools 是我编写的Python 3工具的集合，可与 Mac OS X以及支持Python的所有其他* nix类平台上的Amiga OS二进制文件和文件一起使用。Windows可能也可以正常工作，但未经大量测试。但是，欢迎使用补丁程序。

trans-unit.source: Developer Setup only links this code into your installation and allows you to change/develop the code and test it immediately. (I prefer user install here)
trans-unit.target: 开发人员安装程序仅将此代码链接到您的安装中，并允许您更改/开发代码并立即对其进行测试。（我更喜欢在这里安装用户）

trans-unit.source: Global Install is available for all users of your system and needs root privileges
trans-unit.target: 全局安装可用于系统的所有用户，并且需要root特权

trans-unit.source: Run In Place allows you to run the binaries directly from the bin directory without any installation. You need make only to build the native library of vamos:
trans-unit.target: “就地运行”使您无需安装即可直接从 bin 目录运行二进制文件。您只需要 make 即可构建vamos的本机库：

trans-unit.source: User Install is available for your user only but does not require special privileges
trans-unit.target: 用户安装仅对您的用户可用，但不需要特殊特权

trans-unit.source: A package to support development with classic Amiga m68k systems
trans-unit.target: 支持经典Amiga m68k系统开发的软件包。

trans-unit.source: A tool to inspect, dissect, and build Amiga Kickstart ROM images to be used with emulators, run with soft kickers or burned into flash ROMs.
trans-unit.target: 一款用于检查、剖析和构建Amiga Kickstart ROM镜像的工具,可用于仿真器、软启动器运行或刻录成Flash ROM。

trans-unit.source: Centos
Clone the Git repo: amitools@git
Contents
Create and modify ADF or HDF disk image files.
trans-unit.target: 创建和修改ADF或HDF磁盘镜像文件。

trans-unit.source: Create or modify Amiga's OFS and FFS file system structures
trans-unit.target: 创建或修改Amiga的OFS和FFS文件系统结构。

trans-unit.source: Create or modify disk images with Rigid Disk Block (RDB)
trans-unit.target: 使用刚性磁盘块(RDB)创建或修改磁盘映像。

trans-unit.source: Developers
ELF library amitools.binfmt.elf
Ensure to have Cython (version >= 0.25) installed:
File Scanners amitools.scan
First make sure to have the Python package installer pip:
trans-unit.target: 首先请确保具有Python软件包安装程序 pip ：

trans-unit.source: Follow this route if you want to hack around with the amitools codebase
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使用amitools的代码库,请遵循这一路线。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew Package Manager
Hunk library amitools.binfmt.hunk
I focus with my tools on classic Amiga setups, i.e. a 680x0 based system with Amiga OS 1.x - 3.x running on it. However, this is an open project, so you can provide other Amiga support, too.
trans-unit.target: 我的工具专注于经典的Amiga设置,即基于680x0的系统和Amiga OS 1.x-3.x运行。然而,这是一个开放的项目,所以你也可以提供其他Amiga的支持。

trans-unit.source: I've written some scanners that walk through file trees and retrieve the file data for further processing. I support file trees on the file system, in lha archives or in adf/hdf disk images
trans-unit.target: 我写了一些扫描器,可以走过文件树,并检索文件数据进行进一步处理。我支持文件系统上的文件树,在lha档案中或在adf/hdf磁盘图像中的文件树。

Install pip
Install the latest native Windows Python >= 3.4 from python.org
trans-unit.target: 从python.org安装最新的本机Windows Python> = 3.4

trans-unit.source: Optional Packages
Parse function descriptions shipped by Commodore to describe the Amiga APIs
trans-unit.target: 解析Commodore公司提供的函数描述,以描述Amiga APIs。

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
Python >= 3.5
Python Libraries
Scan directory trees for ADF or HDF disk image files and verify the contents.
trans-unit.target: 扫描目录树中是否有ADF或HDF磁盘镜像文件,并验证内容。

trans-unit.source: System Python
The Easy Way for Users
The hunktool uses amitools' hunk library to load a hunk-based amiga binary. Currently, its main purpose is to display the contents of the files in various formats.
trans-unit.target: hunktool使用amitools的hunk库来加载基于hunk的amiga二进制文件。目前,它的主要目的是显示各种格式的文件内容。

trans-unit.source: The new Documentation of amitools is hosted on readthedocs
trans-unit.target: 新的 amitools 文档托管在readthedocs上

trans-unit.source: The tools are mostly developer-oriented, so a background in Amiga programming will be very helpful.
trans-unit.target: 这些工具大多是面向开发者的,所以有Amiga编程背景会很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: There is a special Edition for Visual Studio available that allows to compile Python 3.x modules: Install VCpython3
trans-unit.target: 有一个适用于Visual Studio的特殊版本，该版本允许编译Python 3.x模块：安装VCpython3

trans-unit.source: This library allows to read Amiga OS loadSeg()able binaries and represent them in a python structure. You could query all items found there, retrieve the code, data, and bss segments and even relocate them to target addresses
trans-unit.target: 这个库允许读取Amiga OS loadSeg()able二进制文件,并将其表示在一个python结构中。你可以查询在那里找到的所有项目,检索代码、数据和bss段,甚至可以将它们重新定位到目标地址。

trans-unit.source: This library allows to read a subset of the ELF format mainly used in AROS m68k.
trans-unit.target: 该库允许读取主要用于AROS m68k的ELF格式的子集。

trans-unit.source: This little tool is a companion for vamos. It allows you to dump and get further information on the API C structure of AmigaOS used in vamos.
trans-unit.target: 这个小工具是vamos的配套工具。它可以让你转储并获得vamos中使用的AmigaOS的API C结构的进一步信息。

trans-unit.source: This tool reads the fd (function description) files Commodore supplied for all of their libraries and dumps their contents in different formats including a code structure used in vamos.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具读取Commodore为其所有库提供的fd(函数描述)文件,并以不同的格式转储其内容,包括vamos中使用的代码结构。

trans-unit.source: To get pip run:
Tools
Windows with MSYS2
Windows with Visual Studio
With the Homebrew package manager (pip is included in the python3 package):
trans-unit.target: 使用Homebrew软件包管理器（ pip 包含在 python3 软件包中）：

trans-unit.source: You can load hunk-based binaries, libraries, and object files. Even overlayed binary files are supporte.
trans-unit.target: 你可以加载基于hunk的二进制文件、库和对象文件。甚至支持叠加的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: You can query functions and find their jump table offset.
trans-unit.target: 你可以查询函数,找到它们的跳表偏移量。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用多种变体来使用Python的 setuptools 安装工具：

trans-unit.target: 需要一个主机C编译器来编译扩展。

trans-unit.source: romtool
typetool
under the GNU Public License V2

vamos allows you to run command line (CLI) Amiga programs on your host Mac or PC. vamos is an API level Amiga OS Emulator that replaces exec and dos calls with its own implementation and maps all file access to your local file system.
trans-unit.target: vamos允许你在你的Mac或PC主机上运行命令行(CLI)Amiga程序。vamos是一个API级别的Amiga OS模拟器,它用自己的实现取代了exec和dos调用,并将所有文件访问映射到你的本地文件系统。

trans-unit.source: written by Christian Vogelgsang chris@vogelgsang.org
xdfscan
xdftool
